name: HH_EPSD_SURG_PROC
description: This table contains user-entered surgical procedures information for Home Health episodes. This information is part of the Intake encounter for the Home Health episode.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SURG_PROC_ID
columns.description: ID for the surgical procedure for the episode.  Links to table CL_ICD_PX.

columns.name: SURG_PROC_ID_ICD_PX_NAME
columns.description: The name of the ICD procedure record.
